headline: Kroger announces big store change amid price gouging accusations
summary: The grocery chain has decided to make a bold move after it was accused of overcharging its customers.

headline: Kroger (NYSE:KR) Debuts 'Summer In A Pint' Ice Cream Collection For Limited Time
summary: Kroger (NYSE:KR) recently launched its "Summer in a Pint" ice cream collection, stirring excitement with new flavors and a promotional free pint giveaway. Over the last quarter, the company's stock price increased by 8%, reflecting a robust share performance. This gain is noteworthy, especially when compared to the market's overall 12% rise over the past year. Kroger's shareholder returns may have been bolstered by product innovations like the summer collection, alongside market-wide positive...

headline: Kroger Brings Summer Vacation Bliss to the Freezer Aisle with New Summer in a Pint Ice Cream Collection and Giveaway of 92,000 Free Pints
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) is scooping up the ultimate taste of summer with its limited-time Kroger Brand Summer in a Pint collection. Available in select quantities the collection features four new ice cream and sherbet flavors that will transport customers to a dreamy summer getaway in just one scoop – no travel required.
